scripts.lint: eslint . --ext .astro,.ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx,.mjs,.cjs && echo '✓ Linting complete: No issues found'
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --ext .astro,.ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx,.mjs,.cjs --fix && echo '✓ Linting complete: All issues fixed.'
scripts.format:write: prettier --write --log-level warn "**/*.{astro,css,js,ts,tsx,json}" && echo '✓ Formatting complete: All files formatted successfully!'
